Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will provide substantial value to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a price of $12000 for the product. This includes not only the cost of the item itself but also an extended warranty and personalized support for a seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your company. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
